description: This file defines a login page component for a web application built with Qwik framework. It includes form inputs for email and password, handles user login submission, and manages UI state such as loading indicator and error messages. Additionally, it sets page metadata.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that renders the login form and handles user interactions.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function called when the login form is submitted; executes login logic and updates UI state.
